title: Selsun Blue Medicated Anti-dandruff Shampoo with Menthol, 11 fl. oz., Maximum Strength, Selenium Sulfide 1%
description: Selsun Blue Medicated Anti-dandruff Shampoo for Men is a maximum-strength formula to help control tough dandruff symptoms. Tough on dandruff and great on hair, this maximum-strength anti-dandruff shampoo provides targeted dandruff control to help prevent and eliminate itchy scalp and visible flakes associated with dandruff. Selsun Blue medicated anti-dandruff shampoo is formulated with menthol to deliver a cooling, refreshing and soothing sensation on the scalp. Stock up on 11-oz. bottles of Selsun Blue Dandruff Shampoo so you always have it on hand. Directions for Use: Shake well. Wet hair, massage onto scalp, rinse. Repeat if desired. For best results, use at least twice a week or as directed by a doctor. About Selsun Blue: Selsun Blue is the expert in scalp health, offering high-quality, effective solutions that are tough on dandruff and great for hair to help you feel confident, poised and in control. Selsun Blue helps control dandruff by powerfully relieving symptoms like flaking and itching. Say ""goodbye"" to flakes and ditch your dandruff with Selsun Blue!
